metadata.title: CVE-2024-11187 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: It is possible to construct a zone such that some queries to it willgenerate responses containing numerous records in the Additional section.An attacker sending many such queries can cause either the authoritativeserver itself or an independent resolver to use disproportionate resourcesprocessing the queries. Zones will usually need to have been deliberatelycrafted to attack this exposure.This issue affects BIND 9 versions 9.11.0 through 9.11.37, 9.16.0 through9.16.50, 9.18.0 through 9.18.32, 9.20.0 through 9.20.4, 9.21.0 through9.21.3, 9.11.3-S1 through 9.11.37-S1, 9.16.8-S1 through 9.16.50-S1, and9.18.11-S1 through 9.18.32-S1.

criterions.comment: bind9 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
isc-dhcp package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
